00116 typedef struct _tmpNetData  tmpNetData;
00117 typedef struct _tmpNetwork  tmpNetwork;
00118 
00128 struct _tmpNetData {
00129     tmpNetData          *next;      
00130     int                 idx;        
00131     unsigned int        size;       
00132 #define tmpNET_BUFSZ    0x3fffffff  /* Buffer size field */
00133 #define tmpNET_BUFSHM   0x40000000  /* Buffer in shared memory */
00134 #define tmpNET_1BUF     0x80000000  /* Buffer allocated with structure */
00135 #define tmpRECV_SZ      (4096 - sizeof(tmpNetData))
00136     unsigned char       *buffer;    
00137 };
00138 
00150 #define freeNET_DATA(freestru) \
00151     if (freestru->buffer != NULL) { \
00152         if (freestru->size & tmpNET_BUFSHM) \
00153           shmdt(freestru->buffer); \
00154         else if (!(freestru->size & tmpNET_1BUF)) \
00155           free(freestru->buffer); \
00156     } \
00157   free(freestru);
00158 
00168 struct _tmpNetwork {
00169     tmpNetwork          *next;      
00170     char                *host;      
00171     char                *addr;      
00172     int                 port;       
00173     int                 sd;         
00174     struct sockaddr_storage ss;     
00175     tmpNetData          *datain;    
00176     tmpNetData          *datainl;   
00177     tmpNetData          *dataout;   
00178     tmpNetData          *dataoutl;  
00179     unsigned int        flag;       
00180 #define tmpNET_ERRNO    0x0000ff    /* Errno value field */
00181 #define tmpNET_ST_UP    0x000100    /* Status = UP */
00182 #define tmpNET_ST_NEW   0x000200    /* Status = Connection just established */
00183 #define tmpNET_ST_DISC  0x000400    /* Status = Disconnect requested */
00184 #define tmpNET_UNIQ     0x001000    /* Only single connection allowed */
00185 #define tmpNET_INCMPLT  0x002000    /* Data operation is incomplete */
00186 #define tmpNET_V4ONLY   0x004000    /* IPv6 support not available */
00187 #define tmpNET_V6ONLY   0x008000    /* Provide IPv6 support only */
00188 #define tmpNET_NOBLK    0x020000    /* Set sessions to non-blocking */
00189 #define tmpNET_KPALIVE  0x040000    /* Set session KEEPALIVE */
00190 };
